text:
I've watched every #PressBriefing,I heard Trump say that,I also read his tweets about #chloroquine.I was irresponsible & dumb.
If this story is true...I don't know who's more dumb,#Trump for making that comment or those who believe & trust anything that comes out of his mouth.🤦🏻‍♀️ https://t.co/yVlz3zQt4m
